definition: privileged treatment of a favored person or corporation (sometimes unethically), a very attractive or seductive looking woman
details:
adjective
- privileged treatment of a favored person or corporation (sometimes unethically)
= example: privileged treatment of a favored person or corporation (sometimes unethically)
noun
- a very attractive or seductive looking woman
= synonyms: smasher
- any well-liked individual
= example: any well-liked individual
- a person loved by another person
= synonyms: steady
